scripts.build-browser: rollup src/main.js --format iife --name "Sully" --file dist/$npm_package_config_version/browser-uncompressed.js; uglifyjs dist/$npm_package_config_version/browser-uncompressed.js -c -m -o dist/$npm_package_config_version/browser-compressed.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
scripts.build-node: rollup src/main.js --format cjs --name "Sully" --file dist/$npm_package_config_version/cjs-uncompressed.js; uglifyjs dist/$npm_package_config_version/cjs-uncompressed.js -c -m -o dist/$npm_package_config_version/cjs-compressed.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
scripts.build: rollup src/main.js --format umd --name "Sully" --file dist/$npm_package_config_version/umd-uncompressed.js; uglifyjs dist/$npm_package_config_version/umd-uncompressed.js -c -m -o dist/$npm_package_config_version/umd-compressed.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
